TopicTitle: 100 ways to get kicked out of wallmart

Articles.Content:
212-

set all the computers to lemon party. set all the tablets to meatspin.

213:

Massive zombie survival RPIRL

214-

use the security monitors as a mirror.

214-

use the security monitors as a mirror.

*Backs out of the room sheepishly*
215.Re-act WWI with nerf guns ,and water ballons from the stock there selling.

216

Reorganize the paint chips. Make a rainbow!

Trekkette, I fail to see the problem in that action... Unless you are trying to enrage the employees by taking "theer jeeerbs" , you sneaky little... 217. Quote this entire list aloud, preferably trough somekind of speaker... Extra score for every 20dB of noise, beginning from 85dB and onwards.
218 waltz in with a cannon fitted with a large speaker with the name on the side reading "Bass cannon."

219

Print out copies of this list and sell them in the parking lot. Discounts to those who attempt any!
220: Ruffle your hair and put on a sign reading "Free Hugs". Pretend you're demented and hold a knife in your hand.
221: Throw your trash onto the cash desk...
222: forget your pants
223: Be Justin Bieber
224: Wearing a ballerina costume running around screaming "I'm a PRETTY PIRATE, YOHOHO, GIMME YOUR PANTS"
225: Get some Super Glue and stick your pants somewhere.

223: Be Justin Bieber

Liked this one.

Way to be kicked out from everywhere... even outside and outer space

224: Try to syndicate them.

227: Land your Rover inside the Wallmart,

but where did the Wallmart go?
228. Land your grasshopper (see what I did there) in the grilling section.
229: Drive your Pagani through the store with a North Korean Flag on the side of it.
230: Play Pewdiepie videos really loud (make sure they have lots of swearing)
231: Take off all of your clothes, put on a speedo and run around screaming "I am the alpha male!"
232.Tell them that you from the future ,and that walmart will take over the world.
233: get a friend to push you around when you're standing in a shopping cart while wearing a batman suit
234.sing MLP songs till they get annoyed ,and escort you out.

234.sing MLP songs till they get annoyed ,and escort you out.

235. Cook until you burns the building down. This bans everyone because you can't shop in shells...
